definition: A systematic approach or procedure employed to address a particular condition or ailment, typically utilized in the field of medicine or therapy. It is commonly employed to describe various methods or techniques used in the treatment or management of a specific health issue.

examples.english: The treatment method includes various therapies.

examples.german: Diese Behandlungsmethode hat sich als sehr effektiv erwiesen.
examples.english: This treatment method has proven to be very effective.

examples.german: Die Behandlungsmethode wird von vielen Ärzten empfohlen.
examples.english: The treatment method is recommended by many doctors.

examples.german: Es gibt verschiedene Behandlungsmethoden für diese Krankheit.
examples.english: There are various treatment methods for this disease.

examples.german: Die Behandlungsmethode wird in der Regel gut vertragen.
examples.english: The treatment method is generally well tolerated.
